snippet: Prime Minister Mario Monti announced his plans after his predecessor, Silvio Berlusconi, said he would run again.
abstract: Italian Prime Min Mario Monti says he intends to resign after losing backing of former Prime Min Silvio Berlusconi's party.
lead_paragraph: Prime Minister Mario Monti announced his plans after his predecessor, Silvio Berlusconi, said he would run again.

headline.seo: Italian Premier to Resign After Losing Party’s Support
headline.main: Italy’s Prime Minister to Quit After Losing Party Support
headline.print_headline: Italy’s Prime Minister to Quit After Losing Party Support
